name: SOCIO TANTRA GLOBAL FOUNDATION
briefDescription: SocioTantra is set-up with the objective of undertaking wide range of socio-economic activities such as implementation of government and private sector projects in skill development, promotion of herbal products, organic products etc. It is also our objective to conduct seminars, workshops, conferences, in the areas of socio-economic development and publish newsletters, journals, books etc.  We are happy to inform you that we have already taken up a project for mobilizing around 1000 unemployed youth and training them in areas relating to accountancy, bed-side assistance and electricianâ€™s job. After the training, these youth will be suitably placed in relevant jobs.
